trans-unit.source: Defines a point associated with a set of workflow status events that are tracked in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um ponto associado a um conjunto de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho que são acompanhados no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: Whenever the status of the workflow instance changes, the workflow instance emits a workflow status event based on one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Sempre que altera o status da instância do fluxo de trabalho, a instância de fluxo de trabalho emite um evento de status do fluxo de trabalho com base em um do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> valores para o infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> defines an interest in all the points during the execution of a workflow instance at which specific types of workflow status events occur.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> define todos os pontos de interesse durante a execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho para quais tipos específicos de fluxo de trabalho ocorrem eventos de status.

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when a specified set of workflow status events occur.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.WorkflowTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para instruir a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> para o serviço de rastreamento quando ocorrer um conjunto de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> pode ser correspondido em vários pontos na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> with an appropriately configured <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> to specify the types of workflow status events that the runtime tracking infrastructure uses to match the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> com adequadamente configurado <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation> para especificar os tipos de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho que usa a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução para corresponder a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint>.

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point that should be sent by the runtime tracking infrastructure when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> para especificar informações adicionais associadas ao ponto de controle que deve ser enviado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de controle quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> is initialized with no annotations and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> é inicializada com nenhuma anotação e não <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You must set a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> para o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associada ao ponto de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> that contains the annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" /> que contém as anotações associadas ao ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection; it specifies that no annotations are to be associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia; Especifica que nenhuma anotação devem ser associados ao ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify annotations to be returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> sent to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> para especificar as anotações a serem retornados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> enviados para o serviço de controle quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are strings that you define that contain information to associate with the track point.
trans-unit.target: As anotações são cadeias de caracteres que você definir que contêm informações para associar o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma anotação pode conter informações sobre o caminho de execução possível o fluxo de trabalho pode levar a partir deste ponto de controle, ou ele pode conter informações a serem exibidas em uma interface de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> that specifies the workflow status events that should be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> que especifica os eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho que devem ser correspondidos pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução para esse ponto de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> that specified the workflow status events that should be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingLocation" /> que especificado de eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho que devem ser correspondidos pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura para o ponto de controle de controle.

trans-unit.source: You must set a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> para o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> specifies one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> values that are used by the runtime tracking infrastructure to match the track point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.MatchingLocation%2A> Especifica um ou mais <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent> valores que são usados pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de controle para coincidir com o ponto de controle.
